adhdAries.title: ADHD + Aries: A Powerful Combination
adhdAries.subtitle: Understanding the unique strengths that come from combining ADHD traits with Aries zodiac characteristics

adhdSection.title: ADHD: The Superpower of Hyperfocus
adhdSection.description: ADHD is often misunderstood as a limitation, but for entrepreneurs and innovators, it can be a powerful asset. The ADHD brain operates differently‚Äîwith heightened creativity, rapid idea generation, and the ability to see connections others miss.

hyperfocus.title: Hyperfocus
hyperfocus.description: When an ADHD person finds something that truly interests them, they can achieve an intense level of concentration that allows for breakthrough thinking and rapid problem-solving.

creativeThinking.title: Creative Thinking
creativeThinking.description: ADHD minds are naturally creative, constantly generating new ideas and seeing patterns that others don't. This divergent thinking is essential for innovation.

highEnergy.title: High Energy
highEnergy.description: The high energy levels associated with ADHD can fuel long work sessions and maintain momentum through challenging projects.

adaptability.title: Adaptability
adaptability.description: ADHD individuals excel at pivoting quickly, adapting to new situations, and thinking on their feet‚Äîall crucial skills in the fast-paced startup world.

ariesSection.title: Aries: The Fire Sign Leadership
ariesSection.description: As the first sign of the zodiac, Aries represents new beginnings, leadership, and fearless initiative. Aries individuals are natural pioneers, unafraid to take risks and blaze new trails.

naturalLeadership.title: Natural Leadership
naturalLeadership.description: Aries are born leaders, confident in their decisions and unafraid to take charge. They inspire others with their passion and determination.

fearlessInitiative.title: Fearless Initiative
fearlessInitiative.description: Aries don't wait for permission‚Äîthey act. This boldness is essential for entrepreneurs who need to move quickly and seize opportunities.

unstoppableDrive.title: Unstoppable Drive
unstoppableDrive.description: The Aries drive is relentless. Once they set their sights on a goal, nothing can stop them from achieving it.

competitiveSpirit.title: Competitive Spirit
competitiveSpirit.description: Aries thrive on competition and challenges. They're motivated by the desire to be first, to win, and to prove themselves.

combinedPower.title: The Combined Power
combinedPower.description: When ADHD's hyperfocus and creative thinking combine with Aries' leadership and fearless initiative, you get an unstoppable force for innovation. This combination creates:

rapidInnovation.title: Rapid Innovation
rapidInnovation.description: The ability to generate ideas quickly and execute them fearlessly

naturalEntrepreneurship.title: Natural Entrepreneurship
naturalEntrepreneurship.description: A perfect blend of vision, energy, and action

resilience.title: Resilience
resilience.description: The determination to push through challenges and setbacks

inspiringLeadership.title: Inspiring Leadership
inspiringLeadership.description: The charisma to rally others around a vision

breakthroughThinking.title: Breakthrough Thinking
breakthroughThinking.description: Seeing solutions where others see problems

combinedPower.footer: This unique combination is why I'm seeking partners who understand that different thinking isn't a weakness‚Äîit's a superpower that can change the world.

developerHelp.title: Developer Help
developerHelp.subtitle: IDEs, n8n, Vibe Coding & Daily Learning Support

soloDeveloper.title: Solo Developer / Mentor
soloDeveloper.subtitle: Be the bridge from architect to shipped product.
soloDeveloper.description: I'm looking for a developer/mentor who can help me bridge the gap between vision and execution. Here's what the partnership looks like:

revenueSplit.title: Revenue Split Per Project
revenueSplit.description: Fair revenue sharing based on each project we ship together. Your contribution directly impacts your return.

dailyCheckins.title: Daily Short Check-ins
dailyCheckins.description: Quick daily syncs to keep momentum, solve blockers, and maintain progress. Efficient and focused.

aiNative.title: AI-Native Builder
aiNative.description: We work with modern AI tools: Cursor, n8n, MCP. You help me leverage these tools effectively.

goal.title: Goal: Make Me Independent
goal.description: Your ultimate goal is to teach and mentor me until I can ship products independently. Empowerment, not dependency.

theBridge.title: The Bridge
theBridge.description: My strength is ideation and architecture. Your strength is execution and shipping. Together, we turn ideas into reality. You're not just coding‚Äîyou're teaching me to become independent while we build something meaningful.

instantHelp.title: Need Instant Help?
instantHelp.description: Whether you're helping with IDEs, n8n workflows, or Vibe Coding tutorials, your support makes a huge difference.

financialHelp.title: Financial Support
financialHelp.subtitle: Your support helps turn vision into reality

financialPartner.title: Financial Support Partner
financialPartner.subtitle: Temporary support now. Long-term upside later.
financialPartner.description: You're funding proof, not charity. Here's what I offer in return:

revenueShare.title: Lifetime 20% Revenue Share
revenueShare.description: Net revenue share for life. Transparent, fair, and long-term.

dashboard.title: Transparent Revenue Dashboard
dashboard.description: Full visibility into revenue streams and financial performance.

nda.title: NDA + Written Agreement
nda.description: Professional legal framework protecting both parties.

fundingProof.title: Funding Proof, Not Charity
fundingProof.description: You're investing in potential and execution, not giving handouts.

donation.title: Make a Donation
donation.footer: Donations are processed securely via Wise. Thank you for your support! üôè

whatILookFor.title: What I Look For
whatILookFor.subtitle: Seeking investors and co-founders who understand the journey from idea to market

challenge.title: The Idea-to-Market Challenge
challenge.description: Many entrepreneurs face a critical challenge: having an amazing idea but struggling with the technical skills needed to bring it to market. This is one of the most common reasons great innovations never see the light of day.

reality.title: The Reality:
reality.text: Studies show that 42% of startups fail due to a lack of market demand, but equally important is the fact that many brilliant ideas never reach the market because the founder lacks the technical expertise to build the product or the resources to hire a team.

vision.title: The Vision
vision.description: I have a clear, compelling vision for a product that can make a real difference. The idea is validated, the market opportunity is clear, and the potential is enormous.

gap.title: The Gap
gap.description: While I excel at ideation, strategy, and vision, I need partners who can bridge the technical gap‚Äîdevelopers, engineers, and technical co-founders who can turn ideas into reality.

lackOfVision.title: Lack of Clear Vision
lackOfVision.description: Without a well-defined vision, teams struggle to align objectives. I bring clarity and direction to every project.

poorCommunication.title: Poor Communication
poorCommunication.description: Ineffective communication leads to misunderstandings and duplicated efforts. I prioritize transparent, open dialogue.

insufficientResearch.title: Insufficient Market Research
insufficientResearch.description: Thorough market research is fundamental. I've done the research and understand our target audience deeply.

fearOfFailure.title: Fear of Failure
fearOfFailure.description: Fear can stifle creativity. I embrace risk-taking and see failures as learning opportunities.

limitedResources.title: Limited Resources
limitedResources.description: Constraints in time and funding can influence the ideation process. That's why I'm seeking the right partners and investors.

whatIBring.title: What I Bring to the Table

vision.title: Vision & Strategy
vision.description: Clear, compelling vision with a strategic roadmap to market

passion.title: Passion & Drive
passion.description: Unstoppable determination to see this through to success

marketUnderstanding.title: Market Understanding
marketUnderstanding.description: Deep knowledge of the market, audience, and opportunity

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.description: Natural ability to inspire, motivate, and lead teams

financialPartner.title: Financial Support Partner
financialPartner.subtitle: Temporary support now. Long-term upside later.

soloDeveloper.title: Solo Developer / Mentor
soloDeveloper.subtitle: Be the bridge from architect to shipped product.

lookingFor.title: What I'm Looking For

technicalCoFounders.title: Technical Co-Founders
technicalCoFounders.description: Developers, engineers, and technical experts who can build the product and complement my vision with technical excellence.

investors.title: Investors
investors.description: Investors who understand that great ideas need the right team and resources to succeed. Those who see potential in visionaries who need technical support.

mentors.title: Mentors & Advisors
mentors.description: Experienced entrepreneurs and advisors who can guide the journey from idea to market and help navigate the challenges.

lookingFor.footer: If you believe in the power of great ideas and want to be part of bringing one to market, let's connect. Together, we can bridge the gap between vision and reality.
